attributes.action: ALL keyworkers and anyone who has worked through lockdown to get a pay rise
attributes.additional_details: You came up with the idea of a pay rise, just discriminating who is eligible to it!
attributes.background:
Considering these hard times, we as a country have all helped each other out in different ways. From doctors, nurses, carers, road haulage, shops, banks, etc. Why are only certain groups of “key workers” getting a pay rise? 
It’s of my understanding we have all worked to keep this country going!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for the wages of many of the people you list. 

They are responsible for NHS pay, so you might like to sign and share this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488

You might also like to sign and share these petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
